HeroSection.description: The Caribbean Cybersecurity Agency (ACCYB) is the leading inter-regional player in cybersecurity for the benefit of public and private organizations in French American territories.

majorActivities.title: Our major activities
majorActivities.description1: Consolidate and analyze information representative of the uses and cyber maturity of each territory with a view to adopting strategies adapted to our realities.
majorActivities.description2: Support businesses and communities in an initial cyber maturity assessment process.
majorActivities.description3: Promote awareness and acculturation to the principle of cybersecurity among the general public.
majorActivities.description4: Assistance center for victims of cyberattacks via CSIRT-ATLANTIC.
majorActivities.description5: Monitoring of the internet exposure area of ​​our members' sensitive services.
majorActivities.description6: Broadcast safety alerts reporting immediate danger.

DiscoverTheACCYB.HeroSectionDesciption: Faced with the challenges posed by digital transformation, the Caribbean Agency for Cybersecurity (ACCYB)'s mission is to promote, by all means, knowledge sharing between the scientific, economic, private and public spheres. The agency thus aims to bring about long-term solutions relating to cybersecurity, safety and resilience of the French territories of America and the Caribbean area.

DiscoverTheACCYBOurMission.OurMissionSubDescription1: Organize cyber governance in our territories and promote the regulations in force and share the realities of our territories.
DiscoverTheACCYBOurMission.OurMissionSubDescription2: Identify and analyze the realities of our territories, consolidate shareable data within the community that can enrich reflection.
DiscoverTheACCYBOurMission.OurMissionSubDescription3: Support all stakeholders towards digital trust and promote cybersecurity awareness and training actions.
DiscoverTheACCYBOurMission.OurMissionSubDescription4: Contribute to the strategic thinking of public and private institutions on issues related to cybersecurity and the organization of a trusted local ecosystem, responding to the challenges of our territories.
DiscoverTheACCYBOurMission.OurMissionSubDescription5: Process requests for assistance from mid-sized players and put you in touch with local partners.

DiscoverTheACCYBOurServices.OurServicesActivity3: Raising awareness among members and the general public

DiscoverCSIRT.Description: CSIRT-ATLANTIC is the single cyber assistance center for mid-sized beneficiaries in the French territories of America. It is at the heart of the national system of regional CSIRTs supported by ANSSI, engaged in actions of prevention, protection and sharing of cyber community information.
DiscoverCSIRT.Description3: FROM 9:00 AM TO 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM TO 5:00 PM

DiscoverCSIRT_OurMissions.Title: Our missions
DiscoverCSIRT_OurMissions.description1: Receive, qualify and sort cybersecurity incident reports
DiscoverCSIRT_OurMissions.description2: Connect the beneficiary with local service providers certified and/or qualified by the competent national authorities for handling the security incident.
DiscoverCSIRT_OurMissions.description3: Collaborate within the regional CSIRT community and CERT-FR. Consolidate and share incidentology results with CERT-FR.

DiscovertheObservatory.Title: Discover
DiscovertheObservatory.Description: The Observatory provides public authorities, economic decision-makers and, more generally, the public with regular information
DiscovertheObservatory.DescriptionSpan: on the state and evolution of digital trust, threat, maturity related to cybersecurity.

DiscovertheObservatory_OurMissions.Title: Our missions
DiscovertheObservatory_OurMissions.detail1: Consolidate, using various organizational and technical means, key information useful for understanding our territories.
DiscovertheObservatory_OurMissions.detail2: Study trends and developments in cybersecurity in our territories.
DiscovertheObservatory_OurMissions.detail3: Equip the CSIRT community, economic decision-makers and more generally the greatest number, for decision-making by making studies of our territories available.
